awards.description: THIS COOPERATIVE AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO WILTON RANCHERIA TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL DEVELOP A TRIBAL POLLUTION PREVENTION PROGRAM, DEVELOP AN ENVIRONMENTAL EDUCATION PROGRAM AND DEVELOP A GIS PROGRAM TO DEVELOP TRIBAL ENVIRONMENTAL CAPACITY.  THIS AWARD PROVIDES FULL FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $90,007 FOR THE PERIOD OF 10/1/21-9/30/22.
